info.name: KismatX API - Complete Collection
info.description:
# KismatX Gaming Platform API Collection

Comprehensive API collection for the KismatX card betting gaming platform.

## üìã Overview

This collection is organized into two main groups:

### üéÆ **Game UI APIs**
For end-users of the gaming platform:
- Authentication & Registration
- User Profile & Wallet Management
- Game Browsing & Betting
- Betting History & Statistics
- Transaction Management

### üëë **Admin Panel APIs**
For platform administrators:
- Admin Dashboard & Analytics
- User Management
- Game Management & Settlement
- Settings Configuration
- Audit Logs & Monitoring

## üîë Authentication

1. **Login** using the appropriate endpoint (Player or Admin)
2. **Access Token** is automatically saved to `{{accessToken}}` variable
3. **Refresh Token** is saved to `{{refreshToken}}` variable
4. All authenticated requests use: `Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}`

## üåê Environment Variables

- `baseUrl`: API base URL
  - **Cloudflare Workers (Live):** `https://kismatx-api.kismatx.workers.dev`
  - **Node.js (Local):** `http://localhost:5001`
- `accessToken`: Current user's access token (auto-saved on login)
- `refreshToken`: Refresh token for token renewal
- `adminToken`: Admin user's access token
- `userId`: Current logged-in user ID

## üìù Key Features

### Game Flow
1. Games run every 5 minutes automatically (08:00 AM - 11:00 PM IST)
2. Game IDs follow format: YYYYMMDDHHMM (e.g., 202602061430)
3. Players can bet on 1-12 cards per game
4. Games settle automatically or manually by admin
5. Winners claim prizes using barcode or slip ID

### Betting System
- **Place Bet**: Maximum 12 cards per slip
- **Claim Winnings**: Use barcode or slip_id via scan-and-claim
- **Cancel Slip**: Before game ends (users) or anytime (admins)
- **Statistics**: Daily, monthly, or game-specific betting stats

## üåê Live URLs
- **API:** https://kismatx-api.kismatx.workers.dev
- **Admin Panel:** https://kismatx-admin.pages.dev

## üîí Security

- JWT-based authentication
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Token expiration and refresh mechanism
- Audit logging for all critical operations
- Optimistic locking for race-safe claims

---

**Last Updated**: February 2026

item.name: üéÆ Game UI APIs
item.description: APIs for end-users of the gaming platform. Includes authentication, profile management, betting, and game browsing.

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: User authentication endpoints including registration, login, logout, and password management.

request.description:
Register a new player account.

**Request Body:**
- `userid` (string, required): Unique user ID
- `password` (string, required): Strong password
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `mobileno` (string, required): 10-digit mobile number

**Response:**
- Returns user details with access token and refresh token

Login with user credentials.

**Request Body:**
- `userid` (string): User ID or email
- `password` (string): User password

**Response:**
- `accessToken`: JWT access token (15 minutes validity)
- `refreshToken`: Refresh token for getting new access token
- `user`: User details including balance, roles, etc.

**Auto-saved Variables:**
- `accessToken`
- `refreshToken`
- `userId`

Get a new access token using refresh token.

**Request Body:**
- `refreshToken` (string): Valid refresh token

**Response:**
- New `accessToken`
- Automatically saved to collection variables

Logout current user and invalidate tokens.

**Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}`

**Response:**
- Success message
- Tokens are invalidated on server

Change user password (requires authentication).

**Request Body:**
- `currentPassword` (string): Current password
- `newPassword` (string): New password

**Response:**
- Success message

Request password reset link.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string): Registered email address

**Response:**
- Reset token sent to email

Reset password using token from email.

**Request Body:**
- `token` (string): Reset token from email
- `newPassword` (string): New password

**Response:**
- Success message

item.name: üë§ User Profile
item.description: User profile management endpoints including viewing and updating profile information.

request.description:
Get current logged-in user details.

**Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {{accessToken}}`

**Response:**
- Complete user profile including balance, roles, status

Get detailed profile information.

**Response:**
- Full name, email, mobile, address
- Profile photo URL
- Account status and verification info

Update user profile information.

**Request Body:**
- `full_name` (string, optional)
- `email` (string, optional)
- `mobileno` (string, optional)
- `address` (string, optional)

**Response:**
- Updated profile details

Get user wallet balance and last transaction.

**Response:**
- Current balance
- Last bet transaction details
- Transaction timestamp

item.name: üé≤ Games
item.description: Game browsing and information endpoints for players.

request.description:
Get currently active game that accepts bets.

**Response:**
- Game ID (format: YYYYMMDDHHMM)
- Start and end times
- Game status
- Card betting totals

**Note:** Returns 404 if no active game. Games run every 5 minutes automatically.

Get specific game details by game ID.

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID in format YYYYMMDDHHMM

**Response:**
- Complete game information
- Winning card (if settled)
- Card betting totals
- Settlement status

Get last 10 settled games with winners.

**Response:**
- Array of recent games
- Each game includes:
  - Game ID and times
  - Winning card
  - Payout multiplier
  - Total payout amount
  - Number of winners

item.name: üìä Game Stats
item.description: Game statistics and winning card details for analyzing game results and betting patterns.

request.description:
Get all settled games for a specific date with winning card details (Public endpoint).

**Query Parameter:**
- `date` (required): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format

**Response:**
- `date`: Requested date
- `total_games`: Number of settled games on that date
- `games`: Array of games with:
  - `game_id`: Game identifier (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
  - `game_start_time`: Game start time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
  - `game_end_time`: Game end time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
  - `winning_card`: Winning card number (1-12)
  - `payout_multiplier`: Payout multiplier used
  - `settlement_completed_at`: When the game was settled

**Use Case:**
- View all winning cards for a specific date
- Analyze winning patterns
- Historical game results
- Date-wise game statistics

**Note:** Only returns settled games with winning cards. Games are ordered by start time in descending order (latest first).

item.name: Get Betting Stats by Game ID

query.description: Game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM format) - Get all YOUR bets for that specific game

request.description:
Get all your bets for a specific game with detailed information.

**Query Parameter:**
- `game_id` (required): Game ID in YYYYMMDDHHMM format

**Response:**
- `game_id`: Game identifier
- `game_start_datetime`: Game start time (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
- `game_end_datetime`: Game end time (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
- `total_slips`: Number of bets you placed in that game
- `slips`: Array of all your bets with:
  - `number_of_cards`: Cards selected per slip
  - `total_amount`: Bet amount
  - `total_winning_points`: Payout amount (if won)
  - `barcode`: Bet slip barcode
  - `issue_date_time`: Barcode issue time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
  - `status`: Slip status (pending/won/lost/cancelled)
  - `is_cancelled`: Cancellation status
  - `claim_status`: Whether winnings were claimed
  - `claimed_at`: Claim timestamp (if claimed)

**Use Case:**
- View all your bets for a specific game
- Track bet timings and barcode issue times
- Check claim status and winnings
- Analyze your betting performance for a game

item.name: Get Betting Stats by Date Range

query.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD format, default: first day of current month)

request.description:
Get betting statistics with daily breakdown for a date range.

**Query Parameters:**
- `date_from` (string): Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: first day of current month)
- `date_to` (string): End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (default: today)

**Response:**
- `summary`: Overall statistics
  - `total_bets_placed`: Total amount bet (money)
  - `total_winnings`: Total winnings (money)
  - `net_profit`: Net profit/loss (money)
  - `total_slips`: Total number of bet slips (quantity)
  - `winning_slips`: Number of winning slips (quantity)
  - `losing_slips`: Number of losing slips (quantity)
  - `pending_slips`: Number of pending slips (quantity)
- `daily_breakdown`: Array of daily statistics
  - `date`: Date (YYYY-MM-DD)
  - `bets_placed`: Amount bet on that day (money)
  - `winnings`: Winnings on that day (money)
  - `net_profit`: Net profit/loss for that day (money)
  - `total_slips`: Number of slips on that day (quantity)
  - `winning_slips`: Number of winning slips (quantity)
  - `losing_slips`: Number of losing slips (quantity)
  - `pending_slips`: Number of pending slips (quantity)

**Use Case:**
- View betting performance over a date range
- Analyze daily betting patterns
- Track profits and losses
- Monthly/weekly statistics

**Note:** Amounts (total_bets_placed, winnings, profit) are in money values. Quantities (total_slips, winning_slips, etc.) are counts.

item.name: Get Previous Games by Date (User Bets)

request.description:
Get all games for a specific date with your bet slips and detailed information.

**Query Parameter:**
- `date` (required): Date in YYYY-MM-DD format

**Authentication:**
- Required (Bearer token)
- Returns only games where you have placed bets

**Response:**
- `game_date`: Requested date
- `games`: Array of games with your bet slips:
  - `id`: Game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
  - `start`: Game start time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format)
  - `end`: Game end time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM format)
  - `slips`: Array of your bet slips for this game:
    - `cards`: Number of cards bet
    - `amount`: Total bet amount
    - `win_points`: Payout amount (if won)
    - `barcode`: Bet slip barcode
    - `issue_date_time`: Barcode issue time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
    - `status`: Slip status (won/lost/pending/cancelled)
    - `is_cancelled`: Cancellation status (boolean)
    - `claim_status`: Whether winnings were claimed (boolean)
    - `claimed_at`: Claim timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss or null)

**Use Case:**
- View all your bets for a specific date
- Track betting history by date
- Review win/loss statistics
- Check claim status for all slips on a date
- Analyze betting patterns for a specific day

**Note:** Only returns games where you have placed at least one bet. Games are ordered by start time (oldest first).

item.name: üé∞ Betting
item.description: Betting operations including placing bets, claiming winnings, and viewing bet history.

request.description:
Place a bet on the current active game.

**Request Body:**
- `game_id` (string): Game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
- `bets` (array): Array of bet objects
  - `card_number` (integer): Card number (1-12)
  - `bet_amount` (number): Amount to bet (min: 1, max: maximum_limit setting)

**Headers:**
- `X-Idempotency-Key`: Optional UUID for preventing duplicate bets

**Response:**
- `slip_id`: Unique bet slip identifier
- `barcode`: Secure barcode for claiming
- `total_amount`: Total bet amount
- `new_balance`: Updated user balance
- `bets`: Array of placed bets

**Constraints:**
- Maximum 12 cards per slip
- Each card can be bet only once per slip
- Must have sufficient balance
- Game must be active

**Auto-saved Variables:**
- `lastSlipId`
- `lastBarcode`

Get bet slip details by slip_id or barcode.

**Path Parameter:**
- `identifier`: slip_id or barcode

**Response:**
- Complete slip information
- All bets placed on the slip
- Game details
- Status (pending, won, lost)
- Claim status

**Access Control:**
- Users can view only their own slips
- Admins can view any slip

Check bet slip result without claiming (read-only operation).

**Path Parameter:**
- `identifier`: slip_id or barcode

**Response:**
- Slip details and status
- Can claim flag
- Payout amount (if won)
- Cancellation status

**Note:** This does NOT claim winnings. Use for checking results only.

Claim winnings for a winning bet slip.

**Request Body:**
- `identifier` (string): slip_id or barcode

**Response:**
- Claimed amount
- New wallet balance
- Slip and game details

**Requirements:**
- Slip must be in 'won' status
- Game must be settled
- Slip must not be already claimed
- User must own the slip

**Note:** Winnings are credited to wallet immediately

All-in-one endpoint: Scan barcode and automatically claim if winning.

**Path Parameter:**
- `identifier`: slip_id or barcode

**Response:**
- If winning and unclaimed: Claims automatically
- If already claimed: Returns slip info
- If not winning: Returns current status

**Use Case:**
- Perfect for barcode scanner integration
- Single operation to check and claim

Cancel own bet slip and get refund.

**Path Parameter:**
- `identifier`: slip_id or barcode

**Request Body:**
- `reason` (string, optional): Cancellation reason

**Response:**
- Refund amount
- New balance
- Slip details

**Restrictions:**
- Can only cancel own slips
- Cannot cancel after game ends
- Cannot cancel already claimed slips
- Full refund provided

query.description: Filter by status: pending, won, lost (optional)

request.description:
Get paginated betting history for current user.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (integer): Page number (default: 1)
- `limit` (integer): Items per page (default: 20)
- `status` (string): Filter by status (optional)
  - `pending`: Bets on active/upcoming games
  - `won`: Winning bets
  - `lost`: Losing bets

**Response:**
- Array of bet slips
- Pagination info (total, pages, hasNext, hasPrev)

query.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD, default: first day of current month)

Specific game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM) - Get all bets for that game. Returns: game_id, game_start_datetime, game_end_datetime, number_of_cards, total_amount, total_winning_points, barcode, issue_date_time, status, is_cancelled, claim_status

request.description:
Get betting statistics with daily breakdown OR detailed game-specific bets.

**Query Parameters:**
- `date_from` (string): Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (used when game_id not provided)
- `date_to` (string): End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (used when game_id not provided)
- `game_id` (string): Get all YOUR bets for specific game (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)

**Response (Date Range - without game_id):**
- Summary: total bets placed, total winnings, net profit
- Daily breakdown with win/loss counts

**Response (Game ID - with game_id parameter):**
- `game_id`: Game identifier
- `game_start_datetime`: Game start time (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
- `game_end_datetime`: Game end time (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)
- `total_slips`: Number of bets placed in that game
- `slips`: Array of all your bets with:
  - `number_of_cards`: Cards selected per slip
  - `total_amount`: Bet amount
  - `total_winning_points`: Payout amount (if won)
  - `barcode`: Bet slip barcode
  - `issue_date_time`: Barcode issue time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
  - `status`: Slip status (pending/won/lost/cancelled)
  - `is_cancelled`: Cancellation status
  - `claim_status`: Whether winnings were claimed
  - `claimed_at`: Claim timestamp (if claimed)

**Use Case:**
- View all your bets for a specific game
- Track bet timings and barcode issue times
- Check claim status and winnings

Get detailed bets for a specific day.

**Query Parameters:**
- `date` (string): Date in YYYY-MM-DD (default: today)

**Response:**
- Array of bets with:
  - Game details
  - Slip information
  - Profit/loss calculation
  - Cancellation status

item.name: üí∞ Wallet
item.description: Wallet and transaction management for users.

request.description:
Get user's wallet transaction history.

**Path Parameter:**
- `user_id`: User ID (must be own ID unless admin)

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `transaction_type`: recharge, withdrawal, game
- `transaction_direction`: credit, debit
- `date_from`: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `date_to`: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)

**Response:**
- Paginated transaction list
- Each transaction includes:
  - Type and direction
  - Amount
  - Reference (slip_id, game_id)
  - Timestamp

item.name: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings
item.description: Public settings accessible to all users.

request.description:
Get public game settings (no authentication required).

**Response:**
- `maximum_limit`: Maximum bet amount per card
- `payout_multiplier`: Winning payout multiplier
- `game_result_type`: auto or manual
- `game_duration`: Game duration in minutes

**Note:** Public endpoint, no authentication required

Check API server health status.

**Response:**
- Server status
- Timestamp
- Version
- Available endpoints

item.name: üëë Admin Panel APIs
item.description: APIs for platform administrators. Includes user management, game settlement, settings configuration, and monitoring.

request.description:
Login as administrator.

**Request Body:**
- `userid`: Admin user ID
- `password`: Admin password

**Response:**
- Access and refresh tokens
- Admin user details with roles

**Auto-saved:**
- `adminToken`
- `accessToken`

Get admin dashboard statistics.

**Response:**
- Total users count
- Active users
- Total games
- Revenue statistics
- Recent activities
- Pending actions

**Access:** Admin only

item.name: üë• User Management
item.description: Complete user management operations for administrators.

request.description:
Get paginated list of all users.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `status`: Filter by status
- `search`: Search query
- `sort_by`: Field to sort by
- `sort_order`: asc or desc

**Response:**
- Paginated user list
- User details with balance and status

Get detailed information for specific user.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: User ID

**Response:**
- Complete user profile
- Wallet balance
- Roles and permissions
- Account status

Create a new user account (admin only).

**Request Body:**
- `userid` (required): Unique user ID
- `password` (required): User password
- `email` (required): Email address
- `mobileno` (required): Mobile number
- `full_name`: Full name
- `user_type`: player or admin
- `deposit_amount`: Initial balance

**Response:**
- Created user details

Update user information.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: User ID

**Request Body (all optional):**
- `full_name`: Full name
- `email`: Email address
- `mobileno`: Mobile number
- `status`: Account status
- `deposit_amount`: Wallet balance

**Response:**
- Updated user details

Delete user account permanently.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: User ID

**Response:**
- Success message

**Warning:** This is permanent and cannot be undone!

Change user account status.

**Request Body:**
- `status`: active, inactive, suspended
- `reason`: Reason for status change

**Response:**
- Updated user with new status

Reset user password (admin privilege).

**Request Body:**
- `newPassword`: New password for user

**Response:**
- Success message

Manually verify user's email (admin override).

**Response:**
- User with email_verified = true

Manually verify user's mobile (admin override).

**Response:**
- User with mobile_verified = true

Get user's login history.

**Query Parameters:**
- `limit`: Number of records

**Response:**
- Array of login records
- IP addresses, timestamps, status

Get all active sessions for a user.

**Response:**
- Array of active refresh tokens
- Creation time and expiry

Force logout user by killing all their sessions.

**Response:**
- Number of sessions terminated

**Use Case:**
- Security breach
- Account suspension
- Force password reset

item.name: üéÆ Game Management
item.description: Game creation, settlement, and monitoring for administrators.

request.description:
Get paginated list of all games with admin details.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `status`: Filter by game status
- `settlement_status`: not_settled, settling, settled, failed
- `date_from`: Start date
- `date_to`: End date
- `sort_by`: Field to sort
- `sort_order`: asc or desc

**Response:**
- Detailed game list
- Settlement information
- Betting totals
- Payout amounts

Get real-time settlement dashboard data.

**Response:**
- Current game information
- All 12 cards with betting totals
- Payout calculations for each card
- Time remaining for settlement
- Settlement eligibility status

**Use Case:**
- Live monitoring during game
- Pre-settlement analysis
- Manual settlement decision making

**Note:** This endpoint is polled frequently by admin frontend

Get detailed statistics for a specific game.

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM)

**Response:**
- Total bets count
- Total bet amount
- Unique players
- Card-wise betting distribution
- Settlement status

Get all bet slips for a specific game (Admin only).

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID (YYYYMMDDHHMM format)

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `limit`: Items per page (default: 50)
- `status`: Filter by slip status (optional)

**Response:**
- Paginated array of bet slips with:
  - `slip_id`: Unique slip identifier
  - `barcode`: Bet slip barcode
  - `created_at`: Barcode issue time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)
  - `status`: Slip status (pending/won/lost)
  - `claimed`: Whether winnings were claimed
  - `claimed_at`: Claim timestamp (if claimed)
  - `total_amount`: Total bet amount
  - `payout_amount`: Winning payout amount
  - `user`: User information (id, user_id, name)
  - `bets`: Array of bet details (card_number, bet_amount, is_winner, payout_amount)

**Use Case:**
- View all bets placed in a game
- Track bet timings and status
- Analyze game betting patterns
- Settlement verification

Get data for making settlement decision.

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID

**Response:**
- All 12 cards with:
  - Total bets on each card
  - Expected payout if card wins
  - Profit/loss for house
  - Recommendation (lowest payout)

**Use Case:**
- Manual settlement decision
- Analyzing game profitability

Settle a game by declaring the winning card.

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID to settle

**Request Body:**
- `winning_card` (integer): Winning card number (1-12)

**Process:**
1. Validates game is settleable
2. Calculates payouts for all bets
3. Updates bet slip statuses (won/lost)
4. Credits winnings (available for claim)
5. Marks game as settled

**Response:**
- Settlement summary
- Total payout amount
- Number of winning/losing slips
- Payout multiplier

**Note:** This is irreversible!

Get detailed settlement report for a game.

**Path Parameter:**
- `gameId`: Game ID

**Response:**
- Game details
- Winning card
- Total bets and payouts
- Winner list
- Settlement timestamp

**Requirement:**
- Game must be settled

item.name: üé´ Slip Management
item.description: Admin operations for bet slip management.

request.description:
Cancel any bet slip and provide refund (admin privilege).

**Path Parameter:**
- `identifier`: slip_id or barcode

**Request Body:**
- `reason` (optional): Reason for cancellation

**Admin Privileges:**
- Can cancel any user's slip
- Can cancel even after game starts
- Full refund provided

**Response:**
- Refund amount
- Updated user balance
- Cancellation reason

item.name: üí∞ Wallet Management
item.description: Admin wallet operations and transaction management.

request.description:
Get all wallet transaction logs (admin only).

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `user_id`: Filter by user
- `transaction_type`: recharge, withdrawal, game
- `transaction_direction`: credit, debit
- `reference_type`: bet_placement, settlement, claim, cancellation
- `date_from`: Start date
- `date_to`: End date

**Response:**
- Paginated transaction logs
- User details
- Reference information

Get wallet summary for a specific user.

**Path Parameter:**
- `user_id`: User ID

**Response:**
- Current balance
- Total credits
- Total debits
- Transaction counts by type

Create a wallet transaction (admin only).

**Request Body:**
- `user_id` (integer): User ID
- `transaction_type` (string): recharge or withdrawal
- `amount` (number): Transaction amount
- `comment` (string, optional): Transaction note

**Process:**
- Recharge: Credits user wallet
- Withdrawal: Debits user wallet

**Response:**
- Transaction details
- Updated balance

Update transaction details (admin only).

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: Transaction ID

**Request Body:**
- `status`: pending, completed, failed
- `comment`: Update note

**Response:**
- Updated transaction

Delete a transaction (admin only).

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: Transaction ID

**Warning:** Use with caution!

Get all system roles.

**Response:**
- Array of roles
- Role name and description
- Associated permissions

Create a new role.

**Request Body:**
- `name`: Role name
- `description`: Role description

**Response:**
- Created role details

Update role details.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: Role ID

**Response:**
- Updated role

Delete a role.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: Role ID

**Note:** Cannot delete default roles (Admin, Player)

Get all system permissions.

**Response:**
- Array of permissions
- Permission name and description

Assign permissions to a role.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: Role ID

**Request Body:**
- `permission_ids`: Array of permission IDs

**Response:**
- Updated role with permissions

Assign roles to a user.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: User ID

**Request Body:**
- `role_ids`: Array of role IDs

**Response:**
- Updated user with roles

Get all roles assigned to a user.

**Path Parameter:**
- `id`: User ID

**Response:**
- Array of user's roles

Get all game settings.

**Response:**
- All settings with values
- Setting descriptions
- Data types

**Settings Include:**
- `maximum_limit`: Max bet per card
- `payout_multiplier`: Winning multiplier
- `game_result_type`: auto or manual
- `game_duration`: Game duration in minutes
- `settlement_window`: Settlement delay in seconds

Update game settings.

**Request Body:**
- Settings to update (key-value pairs)
- Values must be strings

**Example Settings:**
```json
{
  "maximum_limit": "5000",
  "payout_multiplier": "11",
  "game_result_type": "manual",
  "game_duration": "5",
  "settlement_window": "10"
}
```

**Response:**
- Updated settings
- Change logged in audit log

Get settings change history.

**Query Parameters:**
- `limit`: Number of records
- `setting_key`: Filter by setting

**Response:**
- Array of setting changes
- Previous and new values
- Admin who made change
- Timestamp

Get system audit logs.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number
- `limit`: Items per page
- `action`: Filter by action type
- `user_id`: Filter by user
- `admin_id`: Filter by admin
- `target_type`: Filter by target type
- `date_from`: Start date
- `date_to`: End date

**Common Actions:**
- `bet_placed`
- `winnings_claimed`
- `slip_cancelled`
- `game_settled`
- `user_created`
- `settings_changed`

**Response:**
- Paginated audit logs
- Complete action details
- IP address and user agent
- Timestamps
